channel.title: Heaven pkz
channel.description:
Hello,
I have tried a few times now but i would appreciate it if somebody could help and explain to me why its only the heaven pkz client that can connect to the heaven pkz server. I realise the server has anti-leech if thats the problem could somebody please help me. I would like to move on with new clients etc.
Thank you for reading.

item.title: Heaven pkz
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Nope i do not think so

Shall i copy and paste a little bit of the initialize code here ?

Thanks

Read full topic

The heaven pkz client has something that bluurs doesn’t, and that is required to login.

item.title: Heaven pkz
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 25104
at client.method145(client.java:13729)
at client.method62(client.java:3550)
at client.method7(client.java:2652)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
at client.run(client.java:93)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

This showed up in the client.

Im not to sure but is the client or server missing a specific piece of information which ables it to connect. I know that may sound obvious but, i mean like a uid but in a piece of code.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

I have checked and remove the specific uid that was needed but when i try with another bluurs client, i get dced on login.

Any idea ?

Thanks

Read full topic

Look in your login method and see if its checking UID of the client.
